info.title: Company product info manager
info.description:
Manages product info values for the current company.
NOTE: You must be company manager or product manager to manage data through this class.

prop.name: productType
prop.description: The product type which defines the product id.

prop.name: dbc
prop.description: The Redback retail database connection manager.

prop.name: productInfo
prop.description: Array of all product info at a given time.

parameter.name: $type
parameter.description: The product id type. Select for company type or global type using the class constants. Default is COMPANY_PRODUCT.

method.name: add
method.description:
Add a new product info. This functions creates a new product info, with no value.
NOTE: To add a company specific info, you must be company manager. To add a new generic info you must be product manager.

parameter.name: $is_bool
parameter.description: This defines whether the info should be handled as boolean or not.

parameter.name: $generic
parameter.description: If set to TRUE, this will be a generic category. If FALSE, it will be a company specific category. It is FALSE by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: set
method.description:
Set a product info value for the current product.
NOTE: To set a company specific info value, you must be company manager. To set a global info value you must be product manager.
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: get

parameter.name: $infoID
parameter.description: The info id to get the value for. You can leave empty to get all information about the current product. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: An array of all information or the requested info value.
